page.title: 02SHERBORNE HOUSE
page.content: Sherborne House is a big mansion which used to be owned by the Dutton family.It was a mansion with acres and acres of park surrounding it.This is now owned by the National Trust.It was a 17th century building of some importance.Today Sherborne house is owned by Americans and English who have moved into the thirty luxury apartments which have been made in the old house.These apartments have a swimming pool that is indoors and heated;a tennis court which is made of clay,and a conservatory.The conservatory is situated by a big pond which used to be an outdoor swimming pool.In a far corner of the grounds is a "gazebo".The grounds are more than 2000 acres.
